snippet: The German chancellor, Angela Merkel, met with President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia in Hanover, Germany, and expressed dismay over the treatment of nongovernmental organizations.
abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel publicly expresses her government's disapproval of way nongovernmental organizations are treated by Russian government, and does so in presence of Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin at trade fair in Hanover, Germany; group of female protesters try to make similar point in different way, flashing bare breasts and shouting that Putin is 'dictator'.
lead_paragraph: The German chancellor, Angela Merkel, met with President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia in Hanover, Germany, and expressed dismay over the treatment of nongovernmental organizations.

headline.seo: Merkel, With Putin at Her Side, Criticizes Russia
headline.main: Protesters and Merkel Criticize Putin, Who Wears a Smile
headline.print_headline: Protesters and Merkel Criticize Putin, Who Wears a Smile
